prompt: Write an interpretation of the aspect Moon Trine Venus in a synastry chart for a couple.
instruction:
Return your response strictly in the following JSON format:

{
  "label": string, // Name of the aspect (e.g. "Moon Trine Venus")
  "description": [string, string, string], // Exactly three separate paragraphs. Each paragraph must be one sentence long and contain between 9 and 15 words. Do not merge them into one block.
  "daily_signal": string, // Daily subtle signal this aspect creates (2–7 words) showing how it looks in real life.
  "micro_booster": string, // Small daily practice to amplify this energy (2–7 words) starting with a verb.
  "strength_line": string, // Long-term strength or foundation this aspect offers (under 15 words) and ends with the word "Strength".
}
